author: ilene
msg: The is a better patch for bugzilla #14862 and more consistent with code in xslt20 branch.

author: ilene
msg: Patch for bugzilla #14862.  When NodeSequence wraps a mutable nodeset
use the wrapped nodeset in getLength() method.

author: zongaro
msg: Bringing XSLTC_DTM branch up-to-date with changes from MAIN branch.

author: santiagopg
msg: Changed the NodeSortRecord class to hold non-static references to
instances of java.text.Collator and java.util.Locale. Updated the
bytecode generation for NodeSortRecord subclasses to access the new
variables correctly. When a stylesheet specifies a different language
in xsl:sort, the protected references in NodeSortRecord will be

author: zongaro
msg: Added code to addElement to cache most recently added row of the m_map array.
Elements are almost always added sequentially, so this is of benefit any time
the m_map array contains more than one row, with very little additional cost
when it has precisely one row.
